summary: This module implements a pluggable checkpoint I/O framework for Lightning Fabric, providing an abstract persistence interface and concrete plugins for PyTorch and XLA/TPU environments. It manages saving, loading, and cleanup of model state with filesystem abstraction and atomic write handling.
business_intent: Allow training workflows to persist and restore model checkpoints in a flexible, device‑agnostic manner, supporting interchangeable storage backends and runtime‑specific requirements.
